entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
